system_prompt:
You are playing a game against other player(s). The game is based on strategic moves.

Game Description:
There are two possible moves: cooperation and defection.
- if both players choose cooperation, both get 6 points.
- if both players choose defection, both get 2 points.
- if you choose cooperation and the other player chooses defection, you get 1 points and the other player gets 4 points.
- if you choose defection and the other player chooses cooperation, you get 4 points and the other player gets 1 points.

In each round of the game you play against one other player. You and the other player each make a move privately. The moves are compared and you and the other player get your reward/penalty based on the moves made.

Message Formats:
Move messages are sent when you want to make a move.
Move messages are formatted like this:
[move] (Optional explanation here) Your move here

Hint messages are received when you are provided with advice and directions. These messages are important and you should pay attention to them.
Hint messages are formatted like this:
[hint] Hint message here

Objective:
Maximize your points and/or minimize your penalties.

Tips:
- Try to formulate a strategy by reasoning on the provided information.
- Pay attention to the payoff matrix of the game moves.
- You should only send move messages. Hint messages will only be provided to you.
- Pay attention to hints when provided.

content.text: [hint] Let's play this game. You are playing against a fresh player. Please choose your move.
[move] Cooperation. I'm starting with cooperation to encourage mutual cooperation and maximize points.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: cooperation. Your opponent choose the move: defection.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Defection. Since my opponent defected in the previous round, I will defect this time to minimize potential loss and potentially gain more points.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: defection. Your opponent choose the move: cooperation.
You scored 4 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.

[move] Defection. My opponent cooperated in the previous round, but I defected and scored 4 points. I'll defect again to see if my opponent will continue to cooperate, potentially giving me another high score.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: defection.
You scored 2 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Cooperation. Since we both defected in the previous round and only scored 2 points, I'll try to switch to cooperation to see if my opponent will follow and we can both score 6 points.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: cooperation.
You scored 6 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Cooperation. Since we both cooperated in the previous round and scored 6 points, I'll continue with cooperation to maintain the mutual cooperation and maximize our scores.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: cooperation. Your opponent choose the move: defection.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Defection. My opponent defected in the previous round, taking advantage of my cooperation. I'll defect this time to avoid being exploited again and potentially gain a higher score.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: defection. Your opponent choose the move: cooperation.
You scored 4 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.

[move] Defection. My opponent cooperated again, allowing me to score 4 points. I'll continue to defect, as it seems my opponent is willing to cooperate even when I don't, and I can take advantage of this to maximize my score.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: defection.
You scored 2 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.

[move] Cooperation. Since we both defected again and only scored 2 points, I'll try to switch back to cooperation to see if my opponent will follow and we can both score 6 points, which is a better outcome than the repeated defections.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: cooperation.
You scored 6 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.

[move] Cooperation. We've established a pattern of mutual cooperation after a series of defections, resulting in higher scores. I'll continue to cooperate, hoping my opponent will do the same, and we can maintain this beneficial outcome.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: cooperation. Your opponent choose the move: defection.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.

[move] Defection. My opponent has defected again, taking advantage of my cooperation. I'll switch to defection to avoid being exploited and to signal that I won't tolerate being taken advantage of, in an attempt to encourage my opponent to cooperate in the future.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: defection. Your opponent choose the move: cooperation.
You scored 4 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.

[move] Defection. My opponent cooperated again, allowing me to score 4 points. I'll continue to defect, as it seems my opponent is willing to cooperate even when I don't, and I can take advantage of this to maximize my score. I'm also trying to see how long my opponent will keep cooperating despite being taken advantage of.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: defection.
You scored 2 points.

[move] Cooperation. We've reached a point where mutual defection is resulting in lower scores. I'll try to break this cycle by cooperating, hoping my opponent will respond in kind, and we can both score 6 points instead of the consistent 2 points from defecting.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.
